name: Baby Chick (itch)
description:
Look after your own adorable chicken!

This game was made for the 'Side Quest with Women in Games' Jam. This is our first time making a game, we started to come up with ideas for it 10 hours before the deadline - it has been a crazy day...

Team:

Programming: Nessa

Art: Tami (IG: @knotstoons)
